en.title: Things im good at
en.description: These are the things I'm good at, with a proven track record to show it

en.title: Data-intensive applications
en.description: Proven track record in architecting systems that efficiently process, store, and analyze massive amounts of data while maintaining performance and reliability

en.title: Distributed systems
en.description: Expertise in designing and implementing large-scale distributed systems with focus on consistency, fault tolerance, and global data distribution across multiple regions

en.title: Event-driven architectures
en.description: Deep understanding of event-driven design principles, message brokers, and asynchronous communication patterns to build loosely coupled, scalable systems.

en.title: API Design
en.description: Strong foundation in creating intuitive, performant, and scalable APIs with emphasis on backward compatibility, documentation, and developer experience.

en.title: Cloud Architecture
en.description: Comprehensive knowledge of cloud-native design principles, including infrastructure as code, serverless architectures, and multi-cloud strategies, with focus on security, cost-optimization, and operational excellence.

en.title: High-availability patterns
en.description: Extensive experience in designing systems that scale horizontally and vertically, with expertise in caching strategies, load balancing, and performance optimization

en.title: Python
en.description: 12 years of experience in building production-grade applications, demonstrated through projects like PyChess and breachprotocol.io. Active community contributor and speaker at PyCon, sharing expertise and best practices.

en.title: TypeScript / Javascript
en.description: 15 years of full-stack expertise spanning both frontend and backend development, with particular focus on type safety and modern frameworks.

en.title: Rust
en.description: 2 years expertise in systems programming with Rust, successfully applying it to build performant backend services as demonstrated in through-the-ages.com, achieving consistent global latencies below 100ms.

en.title: Java / Scala
en.description: 6 years experience in JVM-based languages and enterprise application development, with experience in both object-oriented and functional programming paradigms, applied in projects like GenMail.

en.title: Vue 3
en.description: 5 years experience in modern frontend development using Vue 3, focusing on component-based architecture and responsive design patterns, as demonstrated in through-the-ages.com

en.title: Flutter
en.description: 3 years practical experience in cross-platform mobile development using Flutter, applied in creating the mobile companion app for through-the-ages.com, ensuring consistent user experiences across different devices.

en.title: AWS
en.description: Comprehensive expertise across the AWS ecosystem, specializing in serverless architectures, managed services, and cloud-native design patterns

en.title: Linux
en.description: Strong command of Linux systems administration, containerization, and deployment automation in cloud environments

en.title: RDBMS
en.description: Understanding of relational database systems like PostgreSQL, focusing on performance optimization, scalability, and data modeling.

en.title: NoSQL
en.description: Practical experience with various NoSQL solutions including DynamoDB and MongoDB, implementing distributed data storage solutions for high-scale applications.

en.title: Infrastructure as Code
en.description: Advanced knowledge of infrastructure automation tools, enabling reproducible and version-controlled infrastructure deployment. Code contributor to the AWS CDK.

en.title: Event streaming platforms
en.description: Extensive experience with messaging systems like Apache Kafka, implementing reliable event-driven architectures at scale

en.title: Public Speaking
en.description: Recognized industry expert regularly invited to tier-1 tech conferences, delivering technical talks on cloud architecture, distributed systems, and software engineering practices with a proven ability to communicate complex concepts clearly.

en.title: Stakeholder management
en.description: Skilled in navigating complex organizational environments, effectively engaging and influencing stakeholders across all levels - from developers to executives - while aligning technical solutions with business objectives.

en.title: Engineering Leadership
en.description: Track record of leading large-scale technical initiatives and transformations, including cloud migrations, architectural modernization, and the successful delivery of high-impact products serving millions of users.

en.title: People Management
en.description: Experienced in building and scaling high-performing engineering teams, with demonstrated success in recruitment, professional development, and performance management. Proven mentor with a focus on growing technical leaders.
